comments:
Workbench tool bar gets in  bad state when all perspectives including outlines 
are closed and you reset your perspective.

-open an editor (a Multipageparteditor is what I am using) in resource 
perspective. 
-close the navigator and the outline (close all but the editor itself). 
-window reset perspective
-The workbench tool bar is now corrupted.

What build are you running? Is it from the 2.0.1 stream, the 2.1 stream, or 2.0 
release?

Lynne, does this happen in 2.0.1 code stream... if so, we should look at fixing 
this.

Unable to reproduce on Win98 with 2.0.1 20020823 build.  

Brad - What build are you using?  Also, it looks like the walkback you got was 
when you opened your workspace, not when you reset the perspective.  Did you 
get a walkback when resetting the perspective?  If so, can you attach that 
log.  Also, any other information about recreating the problem would be 
helpful.  I can't reproduce the behavior you are describing.

Unable to recreate and haven't received any more info from person who opened 
the PR.  Reopen if you see the problem again.
